Christmas Break - No Classes
January Graduate School Orientation
item.description:
Wheaton College
Friday, January 8, 2021, 8am – 8pm



January Graduate School Orientation welcomes all new graduate students to celebrate this new season of life and provide the tools needed to flourish here.This will include opportunities to meet staff, faculty and fellow classmates as well as interact with key offices on campus like the Registrar and Financial Aid to equip new students as they begin this new chapter of life at the Graduate School. Attendance for new residential students is expected and encouraged and all modular program students are welcome to attend.

Location: Billy Graham Center 2nd floor Lounge

Please contact Graduate Student Life (graduate.student.life@wheaton.edu) with any questions!



Sponsoring Organization: GRAD STUDENT LIFE
